It is always a pleasure meeting with Hoosier farmers. This week I spoke with representatives from the @INFarmBureau including farmers from Vanderburgh, Perry, Crawford, Posey, Knox, and Vermillion County. We discussed important issues impacting agriculture across the state. pic.twitter.com/iyA433WHRG

Today I met with Peggy Mills, the President of @TurbinesI. Located on the grounds of the Terre Haute International Airport, Turbines Inc. was founded in 1981 and is a leader in the major repair and overhaul of the Pratt and Whitney PT6 engine. Great job! pic.twitter.com/tPLN1nR6Sl

I am saddened to hear of the passing of former U.S. Senator from Indiana, Birch Bayh. He dedicated his life to public service and worked tirelessly on behalf of Hoosiers. My thoughts and prayers are with his family.

Today I had the opportunity to meet with the @StateHealthIN Commissioner, Dr. Kristina Box. We discussed her important work on combating the opioid crisis, lowering infant mortality rates, and providing access to health care in rural areas for Hoosiers. pic.twitter.com/PU0gj1AutG

This week I met with Hoosiers from the @tomhanify including Mark Mastison and Larry Zuber from the @EvansvilleFire. Thank you for your incredible service to the Evansville community and to Indiana. pic.twitter.com/WFm6uwsVxY

Today I met with the women of @dstinc1913. With chapters in both Evansville and Terre Haute, the Delta Sigma Theta Sorority was founded in 1913 to promote academic excellence and provide assistance to those in need. Keep up the good work! pic.twitter.com/Mt2ZQgJzjb
